body.name: BMart Home Vietnamese Broom Long Handle, Indoor and Outdoor Broom to Sweep & Clean Floors, Sturdy Wooden Handle for Strength & Durability, Decoration Idea, Wedding Broom - 9.84'' Width, 46.7" Length
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: WHISK BROOMS MADE FROM NATURAL:100% natural grass Vietnamese, with environmentally friendly materials, made in Vietnam and handcrafted by skilled craftsmen.

MODERN DESIGN: The brush head is designed with a soft curvatureto help the sweeping broom become slim, both high value and fashionable. The natural broom handle with a perfectly matched 84 cm length makes for a slim, sturdy and useful broom.

LONG LIFE: Produced by skilled workers, natural grass is tightly tied together, the number of grass is high so you can use this broom for a long time outdoor and indoor until you need to replace it by another broom.

HIGH VALUE OF USES: With a reasonable length and weight, you can use whisk brooms with many different uses. First, you can clean every corner of your house such as floors, under cabinets, corner shelves, car garages, gardens, even high places like ceilings and shelves. In addition, with its small decorated asian and beautiful color, you can use it as a decoration for your home, especially occasions such as Christmas, Halloween for children , weddings (wedding broom for bridal jumping the broom ceremony...)

USAGE INSTRUCTION After removing the whisk broom natural from the packaging, tap it against an outdoor hard surface for at least 5 minutes to remove excess dust. The dust is a natural product of asian broom grass used in the production process.
body.description: ***Vietnamese straw soft broom **Details and Features: easy-to-store hanging handle, all natural straw and fiber production raw materials, easy to install handle, finished product **Production process: Each broom after completing the rough product will be carefully post-processed to select and bring to you the best product before it reaches you. Step 1: Bundle the brooms, Step 2: smooth brush handle Step 3: Trim the broom Step 4: Thread the hanging handle Step 5: Packed carefully in a plastic bag **User manual After taking the natural broom out of its packaging, gently tapping the broom against a hard outdoor surface for a few minutes, you should see a layer of excess dust come out. Don't worry, this excess dust is a natural product of Asian brooms once done. Please note that this is not a product fault **Things to note: This broom has a sharp tip, needs to be kept out of reach of children before finished product The broom handle is 100% handmade. Therefore, the size may vary slightly under normal conditions Do not use or store near high temperature or open fire Store in a dry place Each broom comes with 2 broom handles, assembled together to form a complete handle **How to clean: Rinse with water, dry and dry before use
